attributes.action: members of parliment to face criminal procedings over expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a member of the public tried to claim false expenses or deceive his / her Employer or the Government / HMRC they would end up either be sacked or in court at least they would be questioned by the police and I believe so should MP: Do you agree

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
